recipe.title: Autumn Succotash
ingredients: 2 cups fresh edamame or thawed frozen edamame or one 10-ounce package frozen baby lima beans, thawed
instructions: Heat heavy large skillet over medium-high heat. Add bacon and sauté until fat begins to render, about 1 minute. Add shallot and sauté until bacon and shallot begin to brown, about 3 minutes. Add edamame, corn, and 1/4 cup water and cook until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes. Transfer to bowl and sprinkle with parsley.
